main event: A civilian reported seeing an object that appeared to be two yellow-orange lights connected by a series of smaller lights in Brooklyn, New York on July 1, 1957.
interesting points: The object hovered for 10 to 15 seconds before moving rapidly to the west and disappearing., The lights were described as bright-red and pulsing., There were no sounds or trails associated with the object., The observations were made with 8X-powered field glasses., The sighting may have been mistaken for a helicopter.
sighted object: two yellow-orange lights connected by smaller lights
